Package gw.plugin.bizrules

Interface DefaultValueHandler<T>

Type Parameters:
T -
public interface DefaultValueHandler<T>
Interface defines the defaulting behavior for a command parameter

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    List<T>
    getAvailableValuesForContextAndAction(RuleContextDefinitionKey ruleContextKey, RuleActionKey actionKey)
    Returns a list of available values for the given RuleContextDefinitionKey and RuleActionKey
    T
    getDefaultValueForRuleKey(RuleContextDefinitionKey ruleContextKey)
    Returns a default value for the given RuleContextDefinitionKey
    void
    onContextChange(RuleContextDefinitionProvider context, RuleCommandParameterHolder holder)
    Handles the change of a context for this Value This should make any changes to the ParameterHolder that it corresponds to

  • Method Details

    • getDefaultValueForRuleKey

      T getDefaultValueForRuleKey(RuleContextDefinitionKey ruleContextKey)
      Returns a default value for the given RuleContextDefinitionKey
      Parameters:
      ruleContextKey - the current RuleContextDefinitionKey for the Rule
      Returns:
      The appropriate default value

    • getAvailableValuesForContextAndAction

      List<T> getAvailableValuesForContextAndAction(RuleContextDefinitionKey ruleContextKey, RuleActionKey actionKey)
      Returns a list of available values for the given RuleContextDefinitionKey and RuleActionKey
      Parameters:
      ruleContextKey - the current RuleContextDefinitionKey for the Rule
      actionKey - the current RuleActionKey for the Rule
      Returns:
      The list of available values

    • onContextChange

      void onContextChange(RuleContextDefinitionProvider context, RuleCommandParameterHolder holder)
      Handles the change of a context for this Value This should make any changes to the ParameterHolder that it corresponds to
